Nanci K.

messages.subject: Intro....I'm out here!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Everybody, I m here too. VERY busy this evening, but will do a more thorough job of introducing myself later. We are in NC, have three kids (6,4 and 3) I m
messages.messageBody:
Hi Everybody,
I'm here too.
VERY busy this evening, but will do a more thorough job of introducing
myself later.
We are in NC, have three kids (6,4 and 3)
I'm aa confirmed unschooler, with an occasional doubt :)
Nanci, I know a lady who has six adopted children. she loves to help
others with adoption. Want me to pass your email to her??
Talk more later,
Ann
